title: Awesome List Updates on Nov 27, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Nov 27, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Ruby
items.content_text:
### Encryption

*   [Symmetric Encryption](https://encryption.rocketjob.io/) - Transparently encrypt ActiveRecord, Mongoid, and MongoMapper attributes. Encrypt passwords in configuration files. Encrypt entire files at rest.

### Package Management

*   Packages and Applications
    *   [Berkshelf (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/berkshelf/berkshelf) - A Chef Cookbook manager.
    *   [CocoaPods (⭐15k)](https://github.com/CocoaPods/CocoaPods) - The Objective-C dependency manager.
    *   [fpm (⭐11k)](https://github.com/jordansissel/fpm) - Effing package management! Build packages for multiple platforms (deb, rpm, etc) with great ease and sanity.
    *   [Linuxbrew](https://github.com/Homebrew/linuxbrew-core) - A fork of Homebrew for Linux.
    *   [Homebrew-cask (⭐21k)](https://github.com/caskroom/homebrew-cask) - A CLI workflow for the administration of Mac applications distributed as binaries.
    *   [Homebrew (⭐44k)](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew) - The missing package manager for OS X.
    *   [Traveling Ruby](https://foobarwidget.github.io/traveling-ruby/) - Traveling Ruby lets you create self-contained Ruby app packages for Linux and OS X.
items.content_html:
Encryption

  • Symmetric Encryption - Transparently encrypt ActiveRecord, Mongoid, and MongoMapper attributes. Encrypt passwords in configuration files. Encrypt entire files at rest.

Package Management

  • Packages and Applications
    • Berkshelf (⭐1.1k) - A Chef Cookbook manager.
    • CocoaPods (⭐15k) - The Objective-C dependency manager.
    • fpm (⭐11k) - Effing package management! Build packages for multiple platforms (deb, rpm, etc) with great ease and sanity.
    • Linuxbrew - A fork of Homebrew for Linux.
    • Homebrew-cask (⭐21k) - A CLI workflow for the administration of Mac applications distributed as binaries.
    • Homebrew (⭐44k) - The missing package manager for OS X.
    • Traveling Ruby - Traveling Ruby lets you create self-contained Ruby app packages for Linux and OS X.

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Jobs

- API: [Arbeitnow](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/18545278/UVJbJdKh)

  Description: API for Job board aggregator in Europe / Remote

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes



### Security

- API: [Classify](https://classify-web.herokuapp.com/#/api)

  Description: Encrypting & decrypting text messages

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes

items.title: Awesome Tmux
items.content_text:
### Plugins

*   [tmux-super-fingers (⭐94)](https://github.com/artemave/tmux_super_fingers) like fingers, but also opens files in vim.
items.content_html:
Plugins

  • tmux-super-fingers (⭐94) like fingers, but also opens files in vim.

items.title: Awesome Cybersecurity Blueteam
items.content_text:
### Windows-based defenses / Active Directory

*   [Active Directory Control Paths (⭐668)](https://github.com/ANSSI-FR/AD-control-paths) - Visualize and graph Active Directory permission configs ("control relations") to audit questions such as "Who can read the CEO's email?" and similar.
*   [PingCastle](https://www.pingcastle.com/) - Active Directory vulnerability detection and reporting tool.
*   [PlumHound (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/PlumHound/PlumHound) - More effectively use BloodHoundAD in continual security life-cycles by utilizing its pathfinding engine to identify Active Directory security vulnerabilities.
items.content_html:
Windows-based defenses / Active Directory

  • Active Directory Control Paths (⭐668) - Visualize and graph Active Directory permission configs ("control relations") to audit questions such as "Who can read the CEO's email?" and similar.
  • PingCastle - Active Directory vulnerability detection and reporting tool.
  • PlumHound (⭐1.2k) - More effectively use BloodHoundAD in continual security life-cycles by utilizing its pathfinding engine to identify Active Directory security vulnerabilities.
